alert.note: Alert for Houston; Madison; Polk; San Jacinto; Trinity; Walker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 5:43PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Trinity, northeastern Brazos, northwestern San Jacinto, Houston, Madison, Polk and central Walker Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 542 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of small but strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fort Boggy State Park to near Trinity to near Woodville. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Huntsville, Crockett, Livingston, Madisonville, Austonio, Apple Springs, Trinity, Onalaska, Corrigan, Grapeland, Groveton, Point Blank, Lovelady, Riverside, Kennard, Latexo, Goodrich, Seven Oaks, Sebastopol and Lake Livingston State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Houston; Madison; Polk; San Jacinto; Trinity; Walker
